author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
While enjoying Gen Con 2025, I had the chance to catch up with designer Bryan Bornmueller to play the sequel to the wonderful The Fellowship of the Ring Trick-taking Game!  Krystal Rose, also from publisher Office Dog, joined us as we tried out a few levels from the new The Two Towers game!

Check out the game here: https://store.asmodee.com/products/the-two-towers-trick-taking-game
The Two Towers Trick Taking Game releases January 2026.

Product Description:
The Journey Continues! Return to the captivating world of Middle-earth in The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers™ Trick-Taking Game! This is a standalone continuation to The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers™ Trick-Taking Game, with several play modes including solo, 2-player, and The Road Goes Ever On.

STANDALONE EXPANSION TO THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE RING: Dive back into Middle-earth with The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Trick-Taking Game, a continuation of the beloved Fellowship of the Ring card game.
MULTIPLE PLAY MODES: Off
title: PREVIEW: The Two Towers Trick Taking Game | Gen Con 2025
